xml.p: name: Feast of the Winter Star #!String
conditions: Town/900 1400 #!String
set-up: christmasTheme/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Christmas/loadActors Set-Up/playerControl christmas #!String

secretSanta: none/-1000 -1000/farmer 30 69 0/warp Emily 37 59/warp Haley 35 74/warp secretSanta 29 75/faceDirection secretSanta 0/viewport 30 67 true/pause 2000/move secretSanta 0 -4 0/move secretSanta 1 0 0/pause 500/shake secretSanta 100/playSound stoneStep/specificTemporarySprite secretGift/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/jump farmer/pause 700/emote farmer 16/pause 100/move secretSanta -1 0 0/move secretSanta 0 -2 0/pause 700/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection secretSanta 1/pause 500/speak secretSanta \"dialogue1\"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 800/showFrame 4/pause 300/playSound cut/specificTemporarySprite secretGiftOpen/pause 400/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/cutscene addSecretSantaItem/pause 3000/null/faceDirection farmer 3/speak secretSanta \"dialogue2\"/pause 600/eyes 1 -1500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Emily 29 72/warp Haley 30 72/warp secretSanta warpX warpY/faceDirection farmer 2/cutscene clearTempSprites/playMusic christmasTheme/viewport 30 67 true/playerControl christmas2 #!String
Abigail_spouse: I wonder if I could lick one of those canes... #!String
Leah_spouse: I'm thankful for our simple life on the farm.$h #!String
Maru_spouse: Hey, @. I'm ready to head home whenever you are. #!String
Penny_spouse: I'm thankful to have met you...$l #!String
Haley_spouse: Me?... Oh, I'm thankful for... how about I just show you when we get home tonight?$l #!String
Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. As you can see, I'm fulfilling my family obligations... #!String
Sam_spouse: *yawn*... I'm here for the gifts and the cookies.$h #!String
Alex_spouse: What am I thankful for? I'll show you when we get back home...$l #!String
Harvey_spouse: I'm feeling a little overwhelmed... thank goodness for this crisp air...$l #!String
Elliott_spouse: You don't need to get me anything, you've already given me the greatest gift of all...$l #!String
Abigail: Nothing like a piping hot feast on a cold winter's day, huh?$h #!String
Robin: Hiya, @. You're welcome to join our family table if you need company.$h #!String
Demetrius: I'll probably get another tool set this year... *sigh* #!String
Maru: Hi, @.$h #!String
Shane: I've met some people who believe in spirits, and magic... but me? I've never seen anything that couldn't be explained by science. #!String
Sebastian: Spending time with family is tiring sometimes. #!String
Pierre: My sales figures have been phenomenal lately... thanks to the Feast of the Winter Star!$h#$e#Boy, holidays are good for business. I wonder if I could invent some new ones... #!String
Caroline: Ooohh... I've had too much nog.$h #!String
Linus: I'd join in... but I don't think I'm welcome.$s #!String
Alex: Oh, hello.$s #!String
George: A feast for some stupid star? Humbug! #!String
Evelyn: Oh, my! Aren't you cold, dear? It's freezing! #!String
Lewis: Today is a time to be thankful for this year's good fortune. Forget your worries for a day and relax! #!String
Clint: *sigh*... All these happy families. But for me, just another lonely year. #!String

Emily: $y '@! What are you hoping to find under the spirit tree?_A new watering can._All work and no play? That's not very fun.$s_A jug of spiced mead._Ooo... that sounds nice. Make sure to give me a taste.$h_A pair of stylish boots._I see. That would be a great gift!' #!String
Penny: What a beautiful tree.$h #!String
Pam: Hmmph... I'm still upset I didn't win the ice fishing competition.$4 #!String
Haley: I hope there's a new camera for me under the spirit tree! #!String
Jodi: It's not a good time of year for a diet...$s #!String
Kent: Good afternoon, @. Happy Feasting. #!String
Sam: I'm thankful for my guitar and my skateboard. Oh, and my family I guess. #!String
Leah: Gus was just telling me about his artisan candy canes. *yawn*$u#$e#I think he had too much cinnamon nog. #!String
Marnie: Welcome to the Feast of the Winter Star!$h #!String
Elliott: Why, hello @. It's chilly, isn't it? #!String

Gus: It's a fine art, making candy canes. You've really got to search far and wide for the best ingredients. They aren't easy to come by these days!$h#$e#I usually use Fern Island Ringfruit for my premier canes, you know. You can't beat that bright red coloring... And it's all natural!#$e#Oh, you want to know the secret to my deluxe double-canes? Okay, but you've got to promise absolute secrecy. *whisper* It's a drop of vanilla in the white candy to complement the cherry flavor.$h#$e#Of course, peppermint candy canes are the standard, and I always make a healthy batch of those as well.#$e#Hey, you look like you're falling asleep. Are you okay?$s #!String

Willy: $y 'Do you want to hear the Legend of the Winter Star?_Yes_In the night sky of winter, there is a bright star only visible from this valley. No one knows why this is... but in times of old people would come from far and wide to see it.*They believed that anyone who laid eyes on the Winter Star would be blessed with good fortune. Some even claim that the mysterious fruit known as =Stardrop is connected to the Winter Star in some way._No thanks_Suit yourself.' #!String
Wizard: Ah, the mysterious Winter Star. One of the reasons I chose this valley as the location for my... research. #!String
Harvey: I'm thankful there were no medical emergencies this year! #!String
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s #!String
Jas: Ohh! Presents!$h #!String
Vincent: Can we open presents now?! #!String
Marlon: Hey, good afternoon. #!String
Leo: Linus feels uncomfortable about joining in, so I'm going to keep him company.#$e#We'll have our own little feast... mashed winter root and spice berry fish!$h #!String
